revised_title: Motion of Solid Bodies in Rotating Fluids: Experiments and Observations
tldr: The author conducted experiments to study the motion of solid bodies in rotating fluids. They observed that the motion of a cylinder or sphere in a rotating fluid creates a unique pattern of vortices and streamlines. The experiments showed that the fluid behaves as if a solid cylindrical body were being moved through it, providing insights into the complex interactions between rotating fluids and solid objects.
